version_description:
Dragon x Dragon Update Details
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed various minor bugs
- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
A new function “Dragon Colosseum” has been added!!
Train and nurture the dragons you have collected and take on the challenge towards victory!!
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed various minor bugs
- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
[New Event] Dragon Hunt Challenge!!
"Go After the Black Diamond Dragon!!"
We are currently holding an event, in which, throughout the event period, if you evolve two diamond dragons, they have a set chance of becoming Black Diamond Dragons!!
Routes where you can obtain diamond dragons will also be massively expanded throughout the period of the event!!
So, let's go and find us some new dragons!!
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed various bugs
- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
Improvements:
- We adjusted the skill gauge when starting a battle for League Battle
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed various minor bugs
- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
- Added "Clan Chest"
- Added New Dragons of "Zodiac"

Improvements:
- Updated UI of "Titles"
- Updated "Special Offer" dialog design
- Dragons of "Light", "Dark" and "Galaxy" could not be bred and evolved unless it belongs to the specified league
- Updated "Element Correlation"

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed various bugs
- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
- The Rewards for the Top Player Ranking have been updated.
- The top player ranking now displays 50 Players.
- Players who enter the top player ranking will now receive a Title.
- Titles received will now be displayed in the rankings throughout the next league season, and can also be checked from your Player Profile.
- The clan ranking now displays 50 Clans.
- Clans which enter the clan ranking will now receive a Title.
- Titles received will now be displayed in the clan ranking for the next league season, and can also be checked under Clan Info.
- The UI for players who have not yet joined a clan has been updated.
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed various bugs
- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
- Added "Clan Chest"
- Added New Dragons of "Zodiac"

Improvements:
- Updated UI of "Titles"
- Updated "Special Offer" dialog design
- Dragons of "Light", "Dark" and "Galaxy" could not be bred and evolved unless it belongs to the specified league
- Updated "Element Correlation"

Bug Fixes:

- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
Improvements:
- Updated the UI of "Clan Chest"
- Updated Ranking Dialog Design

- Updated the UI of "League Battle"
- Updated the UI of "Hints"

Bug Fixes:

- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed various bugs

- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
- Added the limited edition dragon "Bride Dragon" for the summer months.

Improvements:
- Updated a terms of service
- Fine-tuning adjustments for balance
The following changes have been made:
[Changes about Zeus Dragon, Independence Dragon, and Ghost Dragon]
Offensive ability has been raised by 20%
Recuperation capability has been lowered by 32%

- Added the limited edition dragon "Zombie Dragon" for the autumn season.

- We have adjusted the upgrade fee for the Fire Shrine upon review.

- "Required Trophies" item removed from clan participation requirements
- System for distributing rewards upon end of clan event partially revised

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
- Player profiles can now be viewed when they request to join a clan.

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
We added a new UI for the rarity(Stars of Dragon). The added locations are as follows.
- Shop
- Login bonus
- Info dialog for the dragon in the habitat
- Confirmation dialog during hatching
- Confirmation dialog of "League Reward"

Improvements:
- The performance during server access was improved.
- Updated the UI of "Special Offer"
- Updated the UI of "Item Card" in Alan's House

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed various minor bugs
- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
We added a new UI for the rarity(Stars of Dragon). The added locations are as follows.
- Breeding Hint
- Evolving Hint
- Select a Helper
- Manage Team Page
- Friend Invitation
- Item Card at Alan's House

Improvements:
- Added a "Alan's Choice" Button at Manage Team Page

- Fixed various minor bugs
- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements

We are currently holding an event, in which, throughout the event period, if you evolve two diamond dragons, they have a set chance of becoming Black Diamond Dragons!!

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
[New Event] Halloween Party!!
"Collect Cards and Get Some Dragons!!"
We are currently holding an event, in which, you will receive cards for the tasks you accomplished!!
You will be able to get dragons in exchange for the cards you got during the event!
So, let's go and find us some new dragons!!

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
[New Event]
A winter-only event is starting in December!
We are going to have new winter-style dragons mainly with fire, plant, earth, thunder, and water element!!
You'll need gold dragons to get them! Start collecting them now!!
[Added Simple Mode at the League Battles]
Enabling it before you start the battles will skip the friend invites and automatically select your next opponent!!
Improvements:
- Made some partial adjustments to the game balance

Dragon x Dragon Update Details
New Features:
The new "Rookie Rankings" have been added!
Newbie players can now earn rewards at the Rookie Rankings in addition to the existing league battle rankings!
Also, the Clan Leader can now send invitations to players who have reached the Rookie Rankings to join the Clan!

[Update Details]
New Features:
- In celebration of our 5th anniversary, we have renewed the app name!
To celebrate our 5th anniversary, we have decided to renew the name of the app!
To thank you for your continued patronage, we will be holding a special campaign starting today!
We will continue to have a variety of unique dragons with different motifs, so please continue to enjoy the game!

- Adjusted detailed parts
- Other miscellaneous improvements
